events.message: Customer reported a car accident that occurred on April 30th involving a rear-end collision during heavy traffic.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and keywords related to vehicle collision.
An agent was assigned to handle the case and communicate with the customer about the next steps for their auto accident claim.
The claim was officially acknowledged, and the customer was informed that the process has begun and an investigation is forthcoming.
Requested police report, vehicle damage photos, and personal identification documents to support the investigation of the accident claim.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and photos showing substantial vehicle damage after the collision.
The investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and circumstances surrounding the auto accident to verify claim validity.
Investigation concluded after confirming the accident details and assessing damages reported; no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs based on the investigation findings.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely responses received throughout the claim process.
Following customer agreement, the auto accident claim was officially approved for payment processing.
Payment covering the approved settlement amount was issued to the customer for vehicle repairs damaged in the car accident.
The claim was successfully closed after customer confirmed repair completion and satisfaction with the resolution.
